[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/docker-compose.yml","content":"version: '3.8'

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Redis Cache
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ./backend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-api
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3000
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Admin Dashboard
  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
    ports:
      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
  prisma-studio:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - dating-network
    profiles:
      - development

  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    environment:
      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1
              capabilities: [gpu]
        limits:
          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge
"}

      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}

      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro

      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}

  prisma-studio:

    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy

      - dating-network

      - development

  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama

      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1

          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit

      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:

      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge
"}

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Redis Cache
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/docker-compose.yml","content":"version: '3.8'

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Redis Cache
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ./backend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-api
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3000
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Admin Dashboard
  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
    ports:
      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
  prisma-studio:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - dating-network
    profiles:
      - development

  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    environment:
      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1
              capabilities: [gpu]
        limits:
          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge
"}

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/docker-compose.yml","content":"version: '3.8'

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Redis Cache
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ./backend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-api
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3000
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Admin Dashboard
  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
    ports:
      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
  prisma-studio:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - dating-network
    profiles:
      - development

  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    environment:
      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1
              capabilities: [gpu]
        limits:
          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge
"}

task.prompt:
Modify the docker-compose.yml in C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform to add:

1. Ollama service for Llama AI (optimized for GTX 1050Ti):
   - Use ollama/ollama:latest image
   - Mount volume for models
   - GPU support with nvidia driver
   - Port 11434
   - Set memory limits appropriate for 4GB VRAM

2. MinIO service for local S3-compatible storage:
   - Port 9000 for API, 9001 for console
   - Persistent volume

3. MailHog for email testing:
   - Port 1025 for SMTP, 8025 for web UI

4. AI Services container pointing to the ai-services code

Make sure to add proper depends_on relationships. Read the existing file first, then edit it to add these services.

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/dating-platform/docker-compose.yml","content":"version: '3.8'

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Redis Cache
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ./backend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-api
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3000
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Admin Dashboard
  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
    ports:
      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
  prisma-studio:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - dating-network
    profiles:
      - development

  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    environment:
      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1
              capabilities: [gpu]
        limits:
          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge
"}

    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3000
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Admin Dashboard
  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
    ports:
      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
  prisma-studio:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - dating-network
    profiles:
      - development

  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    environment:
      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1
              capabilities: [gpu]
        limits:
          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge
"}
